navbar.clCheckerDesc: Get instant feedback for your cover letter.

footer.tagline: A modern platform helping professionals create world-class resumes with zero friction

hero.title: Build Your Professional Resume
hero.description: Sky Resume helps you craft a resume that stands out to recruiters and gets you noticed.
hero.extraText: Choose from expertly designed templates and customize them to your personal style. Make your first impression count with a resume that opens doors.

templates.heading: Resume Samples
templates.description: All the resume examples below were either written by our team of professional resume writers or contributed by successful professionals who got hired with the help of Sky Resume.

aiSection.heading: Let artificial intelligence write your resume.
aiSection.body: Are you struggling to find the right words for your resume? Our AI resume builder can find them in no time! It’s powered by OpenAI’s GPT-4.1, the world’s most powerful language model, and it can automatically produce text indistinguishable from human writers. Say goodbye to writer’s block. Generate the first draft of your resume in seconds.
descriptionValues: Implemented marketing campaigns that increased product awareness by 25%...
Led a team of 5 designers to create award-winning brand identities...
Optimized supply chain logistics, reducing costs by 15% annually...
Developed a full-stack web application serving 10k+ daily users...

templateShowcase.heading: Pick a resume template.
templateShowcase.description: Get hired fast with a resume and cover letter that visually stand out from the pile. Browse 40+ ATS-friendly resume templates designed by a team of HR experts and typographers. Customize any template in any way you want.

featureCards.card1Desc: You don't have to type a single word to get the first draft of your cover letter. Let artificial intelligence do it for you, then pick a template that matches your resume.
featureCards.card1Link: Learn more about the AI Cover Letter Builder.
featureCards.card2Desc: Is your resume any good? Compare your resume against other successful resumes in our database and discover your resume score. Get instant feedback and personalized tips.
featureCards.card2Link: Learn more about the Resume Checker.
featureCards.card3Desc: Turn your resume into a personal website with a single click. Let your future employer look you up online. Create a strong online presence and make sure they see you in the best possible light.
featureCards.card3Link: Learn more about our AI Resume Builder.

careerToolbox.heading: The only career toolbox you’ll ever need.
careerToolbox.feature1Desc: Our GPT-4-powered resume builder will help you create an impressive professional resume in seconds.
careerToolbox.feature2Desc: Try our AI Cover Letter Writer and produce a rock-solid cover letter in seconds.
careerToolbox.feature3Desc: Befriend the bots, optimize your resume for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), and get invited to more interviews.
careerToolbox.feature4Desc: All resume and cover letter templates are highly customizable and designed by a team of skilled typographers.
careerToolbox.feature5Desc: Get inspired by resume and cover letter examples that helped real people land jobs with the world’s top companies.
careerToolbox.feature6Desc: Get instant feedback and personalized tips on how to improve your resume.

finalCta.heading: Let your resume do the work.
finalCta.description: Join 8,000,000 job seekers worldwide and get hired faster with your best resume yet.

resumeBuilderSection.heading: You've never seen a resume builder this good
resumeBuilderSection.description: Detail to perfection — for free! Build your professional resume in minutes with our intuitive, drag-and-drop builder.
resumeBuilderSection.trustedBy: Trusted by 8 million successful job seekers worldwide.

coverLetterBuilderSection.heading: Write a cover letter that gets you hired
coverLetterBuilderSection.description: Create a professional cover letter in minutes. Choose from our library of templates and let our AI help you write the perfect letter.
coverLetterBuilderSection.trustedBy: Trusted by 8 million successful job seekers worldwide.

resumeCheckerSection.heading: Is your resume good enough?
resumeCheckerSection.description: Get a free resume review and find out how you stack up against other candidates. Our AI-powered checker will give you a score and personalized tips.
resumeCheckerSection.trustedBy: Trusted by top recruiters and hiring managers.

aiResumeWriterSection.heading: Let AI write your resume for you
aiResumeWriterSection.description: Struggling with writer's block? Our AI-powered writer creates professional content for your resume in seconds. Just enter your job title and let the magic happen.
aiResumeWriterSection.trustedBy: Trusted by 8 million successful job seekers worldwide.

mockResume.name: Carolina Herrera
mockResume.profileText: Telecom Engineer with IT experience. Worked in the most important telecom company in Peru across different areas.
mockResume.job1Desc: Server Admin in Verizon Enterprise Solutions.

aiCoverLetterSection.heading: Generate a cover letter in seconds with artificial intelligence.
aiCoverLetterSection.description: Never write a cover letter from scratch again. Let our AI writer create a personalized cover letter for you in seconds. It's fast, easy, and effective.
aiCoverLetterSection.trustedBy: Trusted by 8 million successful job seekers worldwide.

mockCoverLetter.recipient:
Hiring Manager
Tech Corp Inc.
123 Innovation Way
San Francisco, CA 94105
mockCoverLetter.p1: I am writing to express my strong interest in the Senior Product Designer position at Tech Corp Inc. With over 8 years of experience in UX/UI design and a proven track record of leading successful product launches, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team.
mockCoverLetter.p2: In my previous role at Creative Solutions, I led the redesign of our flagship mobile app, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement and a 25% boost in retention. I am passionate about creating intuitive and user-centric designs that solve real problems.
mockCoverLetter.p3: I am particularly drawn to Tech Corp Inc.'s commitment to innovation and its user-first approach. I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience align with your needs.
mockCoverLetter.name: Alex Morgan

resumeTemplatesList.heading: Kick things off with a stylish resume template
resumeTemplatesList.subHeading: All of our templates are ATS-friendly, designed to leave a lasting impression, and built to help you land more interviews. Pick the one you like—there’s no wrong choice.
resumeTemplatesList.template1Desc: Simple two-column design emphasizing key sections.
resumeTemplatesList.template2Desc: Bold colors highlighting skills and experience.
resumeTemplatesList.template3Desc: Elegant gradient design highlighting skills clearly.
resumeTemplatesList.template4Desc: Bold design with strong contrasting colors.

resumeBuilderFeatures.heading: Why Sky Resume is the best resume builder
resumeBuilderFeatures.subHeading: Discover why Sky Resume stands out as the ultimate resume builder. Here are just a few reasons why it's your best choice.
resumeBuilderFeatures.feature1Desc: Sky Resume is user-friendly and simple, yet powerful. You can create, improve, or edit your resumes and cover letters in minutes with our AI and without feeling overwhelmed.
resumeBuilderFeatures.feature2Desc: From building your first resume to preparing you for an interview with recruiter-style questions — Sky Resume gives you every tool you need to nail your application and land the job.
resumeBuilderFeatures.feature3Desc: We have fine-tuned and customized the latest GPT-4 technology specifically for career needs to deliver highly accurate, relevant, and polished content so your applications always stand out.
resumeBuilderFeatures.feature4Desc: You can easily translate your resume into 8 major world languages without having to rely on 3rd party programs. Sky Resume makes it simple to apply globally with our spot-on translations.
resumeBuilderFeatures.feature5Desc: Choose from 40+ ATS-optimized, stylish, and functional templates for both resumes and cover letters to create a coherent, professional application that gets you hired.
resumeBuilderFeatures.feature6Desc: Sky Resume has already helped over 6 million job-seekers worldwide to successfully land their next job. There has to be something in it, right? Check their reviews and see for yourself.
